txt.en: The path to Stormwall is north-east of Skarháld.\n\nYou continue on the path to Stormwall, keeping an eye out for the missing Zhélruka.
Set out on the path to Stormwall
You see a dwarf up ahead!
The path to Stormwall is north-east of Skarháld.\n\nYou should set out on the path to Stormwall, keeping an eye out for the five Zhélruka.
This Zhélruka died from many bites
This Zhélruka has been mauled by some beast
This Zhélruka was burned by something
Five unprepared Zhélruka have set out for Stormwall, against Agátur's dire warnings, in search for the lost realm of Thafar-gathol.

'You must go after those five Zhélruka, [placeholder]. They are fools or, what is their word for it? \qDraks!\q But the fate they hurry towards, unprepared as they are, is too harsh a punishment for folly.'
The path to Stormwall is north-east of Skarháld.\n\nYou continue on the path to Stormwall, keeping an eye out for the missing Zhélruka.
It appears that this Zhélruka died fighting something large.
